channel.title: PkFury 317 [All staff spots open! pm me]
channel.description:
[b]Play here: [/b] download client [url=http://up.ht/UhhQMs]http://up.ht/UhhQMs[/url] forums coming soon!
[img]http://runefury.com/img/info.png[/img]
PkFury may be looked upon as a ordinary server. However this is far from the actual truth, PkFury unlike many servers, is a created for the players. We strive on creating the 'Perfect' server.
We know and understand that the players come first before anything which is why we are always open to suggestions. Our friendly and helpful staff will be there to assist you throughout your stay at PkFury.
PkFury is not just a 'game' but a place to relax and enjoy yourself. We try our absolute best on having a fun and safe environment. We believe that everyone should treated the same no matter what. We are all strong. We are all confident. We are all PkFury.
[img]http://runefury.com/img/feat.png[/img]
-All Weapon Specials 100% -100% Overloads -PERFECT Switching -Near Perfect Combat -Free For All Minigame -100% Animated Nex -100% Animated Nomad -100% Animad Jad -100% Corporeal Beast -Pk Title Shops -Donator Crown Support -All Pvp Armours & Weapons 100% -All Nex Armours 100% With Effect -No Lag -VPS Hosted -24/7 -Custom Interfaces -Symbols (<>^\) Support -Better graphics -Player Clipping -NPC Clipping -Spawn Tab -Interactive Quest Tab -All Dungeoneering Items + Effects -Spawn Server -Much More!
Some pictures: [img]http://runefury.com/img/corp.png[/img]
[img]http://runefury.com/img/nex.png[/img]
[img]http://runefury.com/img/nomad.png[/img]
[img]http://runefury.com/img/duel.pngimg]
[img]http://runefury.com/img/jad.png[/img]
Be sure to come check us out!

Play here: download client http://up.ht/UhhQMs
forums coming soon!

PkFury may be looked upon as a ordinary server. However this is far from the actual truth, PkFury unlike many servers, is a created for the players. We strive on creating the ‘Perfect’ server.

We know and understand that the players come first before anything which is why we are always open to suggestions. Our friendly and helpful staff will be there to assist you throughout your stay at PkFury.

PkFury is not just a ‘game’ but a place to relax and enjoy yourself. We try our absolute best on having a fun and safe environment. We believe that everyone should treated the same no matter what. We are all strong. We are all confident. We are all PkFury.

-All Weapon Specials 100%
